name: Conslot
text: When Attacking: Up to 1 of your opponent's rested cost 4 or lower characters cannot be set active during their next Refresh Phase.

effect.text: Up to 1 of your opponent's rested cost 4 or lower characters cannot be set active during their next Refresh Phase.
